short_summary: TBIPS contract for dynamic task selection and delivery.
full_summary:
**Professional Services Contract for Chief Innovation and Technology Office (CITO)**

**Reference:** CB-885-75457713
**Solicitation Number:** 20232453-IRB
**Publication Date:** January 25, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 28, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Summary:**

The Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (IRB) is seeking proposals from qualified Service Providers to deliver Professional Services for the Chief Innovation and Technology Office (CITO) under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) contract.

**Description:**

The TBIPS contract will enable the CITO to rapidly and dynamically select the required professional resources to work on targeted tasks and deliverables in response to emerging needs.

**Key Contract Requirements:**

* Delivery of Information Technology (IT) consulting services
* Provision of IT management services

**Contractual Obligations:**

* The selected Service Provider(s) will be responsible for providing the required professional services under the TBIPS contract.
* The Service Provider(s) must meet the contractual deliverables and milestones as outlined in the tender documentation.

**Important Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: February 28, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* Estimated Contract Start Date: Upon award of contract
* Estimated Contract End Date: None

**Contact Information:**

* Kris Rickett
* Email: [kris.rickett@irb-cisr.gc.ca](mailto:kris.rickett@irb-cisr.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 541-7157

**Document Access:**

The tender documentation is available on the Canada Buys website at:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca

The tbips contract will be awarded based on the lowest price principle to a qualified Service Provider that meets the contractual requirements. Only bids from Service Providers who have successfully completed an assessment questionnaire will be evaluated.  The Service Provider who is selected will be required to provide all necessary information security documentation and ensure compliance with relevant legislation.

- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
